pages.text: $(li)Biotite Block is a new decorative block.$(br)$(li)It can be used to save $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/quark/ender_biotite)Biotite$(/l) in a more efficient way.

$(li)It can be used to craft Biotite Bricks, $(l:patchouli:redstone/quark/ender_watcher)Ender Watcher$(/l), Biotite Slabs, Biotite Stairs, Biotite Walls and Biotite Pillars in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can obtain Smooth Biotite block Smelting a Block of Biotite in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:utility/charm/kiln)Kiln$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be placed in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/stonecutter)Stonecutter$(/l) to make other decorative blocks.
